properties.areaDesc: Mississippi, MO; New Madrid, MO; Fulton, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 6:30PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following river in
Kentucky...Missouri...

Mississippi River at New Madrid

.Runoff from recent heavy rain combined with forecast rainfall over
the next 48 hours will cause the Mississippi River at New Madrid to
rise into minor flood stage. The river will reach flood stage on
Thursday and crest near 36.5 feet Monday, February 17.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at New Madrid
* from late Wednesday night until further notice.
* At  6:00 PM Sunday the stage was 30.9 feet.
* Flood Stage is 34.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Thursday morning and continue
to rise to near 36.5 feet by Monday, February 17.
* Impact...At 38.0 Feet...Heavy agricultural damage begins.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
